quotes.in: no for 6 May 2011 col Ideas and Opinions art To the ICJ or Not para 2
quotes.quote: Our history began when English and Scottish sailors (buccaneers) landed at the mouth of the Belize River in 1638. They were the first to do so and, might have claimed the land in the name of their sovereign, except for the fact that this land, our land, by an accident of history was from 1494, a part of the Spanish Main. This is how it came about.
